mapper.select: SELECT * FROM money WHERE money_idx=#{money_idx} AND del_ny='n'

SELECT m.money_type, -- 월별 지출 금액 SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(m.money_when, '%Y-%m-%d')) = #{year} AND MONTH(STR_TO_DATE(m.money_when, '%Y-%m-%d')) = #{month} THEN m.money_out ELSE 0 END) AS monthOut,
-- money_type별 비중 계산 FLOOR( (SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(m.money_when, '%Y-%m-%d')) = #{year} AND MONTH(STR_TO_DATE(m.money_when, '%Y-%m-%d')) = #{month} THEN m.money_out ELSE 0 END) / (SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(m2.money_when, '%Y-%m-%d')) = #{year} AND MONTH(STR_TO_DATE(m2.money_when, '%Y-%m-%d')) = #{month} THEN m2.money_out ELSE 0 END) FROM money m2 WHERE m2.user_idx = #{user_idx} AND m2.del_ny = 'n')) * 100 ) AS monthPercentage FROM money m WHERE m.user_idx = #{user_idx} AND m.del_ny = 'n' GROUP BY m.money_type

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(m.money_when, '%Y-%m-%d')) = #{currentYear} AND MONTH(STR_TO_DATE(m.money_when, '%Y-%m-%d')) = #{currentMonth} THEN m.money_out ELSE 0 END) AS currentMonthOut, SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(m.money_when, '%Y-%m-%d')) = #{lastYear} AND MONTH(STR_TO_DATE(m.money_when, '%Y-%m-%d')) = #{lastMonth} THEN m.money_out ELSE 0 END) AS lastMonthOut FROM `user` u INNER JOIN money m ON u.user_idx = m.user_idx WHERE u.user_idx = #{user_idx} AND m.del_ny='n'

SELECT money_when, money_type, money_where, CASE WHEN money_in <> 0 THEN CONCAT('+', money_in) WHEN money_out <> 0 THEN CONCAT('-', money_out) ELSE NULL END AS money
FROM `user` u INNER JOIN money m ON u.user_idx = m.user_idx WHERE u.user_idx = #{user_idx} AND YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(m.money_when, '%Y-%m-%d')) = #{year} AND MONTH(STR_TO_DATE(m.money_when, '%Y-%m-%d')) = #{month} AND (money_in <> 0 OR money_out <> 0) AND m.del_ny='n'

SELECT money_type, money_where, CASE WHEN money_in <> 0 THEN CONCAT('+', money_in) WHEN money_out <> 0 THEN CONCAT('-', money_out) ELSE NULL END AS money
FROM `user` u INNER JOIN money m ON u.user_idx = m.user_idx WHERE u.user_idx = #{user_idx} AND YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(m.money_when, '%Y-%m-%d')) = #{year} AND MONTH(STR_TO_DATE(m.money_when, '%Y-%m-%d')) = #{month} AND DAY(STR_TO_DATE(m.money_when, '%Y-%m-%d')) = #{day} AND (money_in <> 0 OR money_out <> 0) AND m.del_ny='n'
mapper.insert: insert into `money` ( user_idx, money_when, money_type, money_where, money_in, money_out, created_date ) values ( #{user_idx}, #{money_when}, #{money_type}, #{money_where}, #{money_in}, #{money_out}, SYSDATE() )
